summary.span: 表示为相关端实现常用功能的基类。

span.span: Represents a base class that implements common functionality for a related end.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 类和类的基类 。 is the base class for the class and the class. 类实现 和 类之间共享的功能。The class implements functionality that is shared between the and classes. 此类不应在代码中直接使用。This class is not intended to be used directly in your code.

summary.span: 定义两个附加对象之间的关系。

span.span: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Attach(IEnumerable, Boolean)` 方法用于定义当对象和相关对象已经附加到一个对象上下文时，这两个对象之间的关系。The `Attach(IEnumerable, Boolean)` method is used to define a relationship between an object and a related object when both objects are already attached to an object context. 如果相关对象尚未附加到对象上下文，则将相关对象设置为 的 属性，或者对 调用 方法。Set the related object to the property of the or call the method on the if the related object is not already attached to the object context. 两个对象都分离时，还可以通过将相关对象设置为 的 属性或对 调用 方法，然后附加对象图中的根对象来定义关系。When both objects are detached, you can also define the relationship by setting the related object to the property of the or by calling the method on the and then attaching the root object in the object graph. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [附加和分离对象](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896271(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896271(v=vs.100)). 对象服务在对相关端进行附加操作时调用 `Attach(IEnumerable, Boolean)` 方法。The `Attach(IEnumerable, Boolean)` method is called by Object Services during attach operations against a related end.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已加载所有相关对象。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether all related objects have been loaded.

value.span: 如果相关端包含数据库中的所有相关对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the related end contains all the related objects from the database; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法会将 标志设置为 `true` 。Calling the method sets the flag to `true`. 对 集调用方法 `false` 。Calling the method on an sets to `false`. 如果相关端包含在查询路径中，也可能加载 或 。An or may also be loaded if the related end is included in the query path. 有关范围的详细信息，请参阅 [加载相关对象](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896272(v=vs.100))。For more information about span, see [Loading Related Objects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896272(v=vs.100)). `Load`无论是否为，方法都将 从数据源加载相关对象 `true` 。The `Load` method on and loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`. 分离对象时， 标志将从更改 `false` 为 `true` 。When an object is detached, the flag is changed from `false` to `true`. 为了保证在处理之前已完全加载相关端，应检查是否 为 `false` 。To guarantee that a related end is fully loaded before doing processing, you should check whether is `false`. 如果 为 `false` ，则应调用 方法。If is `false`, you should call the method.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads the related object or objects into the local collection or reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于被跟踪的对象，默认合并选项为 。或者，当对象没有在 中跟踪时，默认选项为 。The default merge option is for tracked objects or when the object is not tracked in the . 若要指定之外的合并选项 ，请对使用 `Load` 特定参数的或调用方法 。To specify a merge option other than , call the `Load` method on the or the that takes a specific parameter. 调用 方法会将 标志设置为 `true` 。Calling the method sets the flag to `true`. 无论是否为，方法都从数据源加载相关对象 `true` 。The method loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`.

summary.span: 获取关系的源端的角色名称。

span.span: Gets the role name at the source end of the relationship.
A that is the role name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 角色名称由 `Role` `End` 在概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素的属性指定。The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41). ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于 [Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例：数据库](https://archive.codeplex.com/?p=msftdbprodsamples)，该数据库是由 [实体数据模型向导](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb399247(v=vs.100))生成的。The example in this topic is based on the [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://archive.codeplex.com/?p=msftdbprodsamples), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb399247(v=vs.100)). 下面的示例向实体中添加新 `SalesOrderHeader` 实体 `Contact` 。The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity. 然后，它从实体获取所有相关端， `Contact` 并显示每个相关端的关系名称、源角色名称和目标角色名称。Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果源实体对象附加到缓存，则所有连接的端都将添加到对象缓存中，并将其相应的关系添加到中 。If the source entity object is attached to a cache, then all the connected ends are added to the object cache and their corresponding relationships are also added to the . 关系的也是固定的。The of the relationship is also fixed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果相关端已附加了某些实体，则现有实体将与新实体合并。If the related end already has some entities attached to it, the existing entities will be merged with the new entity. 不假定该新实体是一组完整的相关实体对象。The new entity is not assumed to be the complete set of related entity objects. 源实体对象和传入的所有实体对象都必须处于 或 状态。The source entity object and all entity objects passed in must be in an or state. 仅当状态管理器已跟踪关系实例时才允许已删除的元素。Deleted elements are allowed only when the state manager is already tracking the relationship instance.

param.span: 相关端的名称。

span.span: The name of the related end.

summary.span: 确保相关对象可以成功加载到本地集合或引用中。

span.span: Ensures that the related object or objects can be successfully loaded into the local collection or reference.

returns.span: 一个 ，用于加载一个或多个相关端对象。

span.span: An that is used to load the object or objects at the related end.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象服务 通过调用 [IRelatedEnd. CreateSourceQuery](xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IRelatedEnd%23CreateSourceQuery) 方法获取。Object Services obtains the by calling the [IRelatedEnd.CreateSourceQuery](xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IRelatedEnd%23CreateSourceQuery) method. 对象服务在执行加载操作前调用 `ValidateLoad` 方法以确保操作将成功。Object Services calls the `ValidateLoad` method before executing a load operation to ensure that the operation will succeed.

exception.span: 使用 查询来检索源对象并且 不是 或相关对象已经加载时。

span.span: When the source object was retrieved by using a query and the is not or the related objects are already loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig instance void ValidateOwnerForAttach() cil managed

summary.span: 确保相关端所属的对象支持附加操作。

span.span: Ensures that the object to which the related end belongs supports an attach operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象服务在执行附加操作之前调用 ValidateOwnerForAttach 方法，以确保操作将成功。Object Services calls the ValidateOwnerForAttach method before executing an attach operation to ensure that the operation will succeed.

exception.span: 当源对象没有附加到 ，从 查询返回，或者未处于 或 状态时。
